title: Dynamic Understanding of Organizational Learning and Unlearning: Change Management Through Second-Order Learning and Disruption

context.prior_knowledge: Basic organizational workflow comprehension and foundational change management concepts
context.additional_context: Emphasis on practice-centered interactive activities with real-time feedback provision.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core roles of the 'interruption' stage in the organizational learning process
Learners can analyze cases by applying unlearning to the double-loop learning framework
Learners can identify situations requiring unlearning in real work scenarios and propose improvement measures
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
